main event: Multiple unidentified flying objects were observed in a circular formation by military personnel at Graughan Air Force Base in Temple, Texas on April 6, 1952.
interesting points: The objects were described as saucer-shaped with a bluish-white glow,The sighting lasted approximately 35 minutes, initially seen at an elevation of 30-40 degrees,The formation consisted of 8 to 10 objects flying at an estimated altitude of 10,000 feet,The movement was smooth and even with no irregularities in formation,Four pilots and three visual observers witnessed the event, and all are considered reliable and experienced.
sighted object: saucer-shaped objects in a circular formation
witness description: four pilots and three visual observers from Graughan Air Force Base
